DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the efficacy and safety of AK156 in Japanese patients with primary osteoporosis.
DOC.brief_title: Study of AK156 in Primary Osteoporosis Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnosed with primary osteoporosis Patients who have vertebral fractures at the time of screening Patients diagnosed with secondary osteoporosis Patients with a current uncontrolled medical disorder or other condition which makes the patient unsuitable for the study
